org.apache.twill.api

Class EventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.twill.api.EventHandler

  • public abstract class EventHandler
extends Object
    A callback handler for acting on application events related to TwillRunnable lifecycle events.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EventHandler.TimeoutAction
      Represents action to act upon runnable launch timeout.
      static class  EventHandler.TimeoutEvent
      This class holds information about a launch timeout event.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected EventHandlerContext context 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EventHandler() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void aborted()
      Invoked by the application when the application is aborted because of timeout.
      void completed()
      Invoked by the application when all containers complete.
      EventHandlerSpecification configure()
      Returns an EventHandlerSpecification for configuring this handler class.
      void containerLaunched(String runnableName, int instanceId, String containerId)
      Invoked by the application when new container is launched for a TwillRunnable.
      void containerStopped(String runnableName, int instanceId, String containerId, int exitStatus)
      Invoked by the application when the container allocated for a TwillRunnable is stopped.
      void destroy()
      Invoked by the application when shutting down.
      protected Map<String,String> getConfigs()
      Returns set of configurations available at runtime for access.
      void initialize(EventHandlerContext context)
      Invoked by the application to initialize this EventHandler instance.
      void killed()
      Invoked by the application when stop command is received to kill the current application.
      EventHandler.TimeoutAction launchTimeout(Iterable<EventHandler.TimeoutEvent> timeoutEvents)
      Invoked when the number of expected instances doesn't match with number of actual instances.
      void started()
      Invoked by the application when it starts.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public EventHandlerSpecification configure()
        Returns an EventHandlerSpecification for configuring this handler class.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(EventHandlerContext context)
        Invoked by the application to initialize this EventHandler instance.
        Parameters:
        context - context object for accessing the event handler execution context.

      • started

        public void started()
        Invoked by the application when it starts.

      • containerLaunched

        public void containerLaunched(String runnableName,
                     int instanceId,
                     String containerId)
        Invoked by the application when new container is launched for a TwillRunnable.
        Parameters:
        runnableName - name of the runnable to be run in the new container
        instanceId - the instance ID of the runnable instance to be run in the new container
        containerId - the ID of the newly launched container

      • containerStopped

        public void containerStopped(String runnableName,
                    int instanceId,
                    String containerId,
                    int exitStatus)
        Invoked by the application when the container allocated for a TwillRunnable is stopped.
        Parameters:
        runnableName - name of the runnable in the stopped container
        instanceId - the instance ID of the runnable instance run in the stopped container
        containerId - the ID of the stopped container
        exitStatus - the exit status of the container

      • completed

        public void completed()
        Invoked by the application when all containers complete.

      • killed

        public void killed()
        Invoked by the application when stop command is received to kill the current application.

      • aborted

        public void aborted()
        Invoked by the application when the application is aborted because of timeout.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Invoked by the application when shutting down.

      • launchTimeout

        public EventHandler.TimeoutAction launchTimeout(Iterable<EventHandler.TimeoutEvent> timeoutEvents)
        Invoked when the number of expected instances doesn't match with number of actual instances.
        Parameters:
        timeoutEvents - An Iterable of EventHandler.TimeoutEvent that contains information about runnable launch timeout.
        Returns:
        A EventHandler.TimeoutAction to govern action to act. By default it is to recheck after 60 seconds.

      • getConfigs

        protected Map<String,String> getConfigs()
        Returns set of configurations available at runtime for access.
